name: The Orc Problem
description:
Game made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 166.

Theme: 'Roots'.

The fountains of the orcs have been corrupted by demons, you must heal them and end the problem at its roots.

Can you solve the problem in the correct way?

Controls MoveW A S DInteractEAimMouseShootLeft Click
Credits

Graphics: 0x72

Font: Daniel Linssen 

Music: timbeek.com

Sounds: Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment
